name: Hunter's Unity
description: Increases attack power relative to the number of fellow hunters with this skill activated.

name: Artillery
description: Increases the damage of gunlance's ammo/Wyvern's Fire attacks, charge blade's phial attacks, and sticky ammo.

name: Latent Power
description: Affinity raised by (20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60%) and Special Gauge fill rate increased by (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) when certain conditions are met.

name: Power Prolonger
description: (Ever so, Slightly, Moderately, Greatly, Massively) extends the duration of the powered-up state granted by dual blades, long swords, hunting horns, switch axes and charge blades.

name: Status Sneak Attack
description: Makes it more probable to inflict status ailment buildup when attacking a monster from behind.

name: Critical Boost
description: Increases the damage multiplier of critical hits.

name: Skyward Striker
description: Increases the damage of aerial attacks.

name: Sleep Attack
description: Increases weapon's sleep buildup.

name: Resentment
description: When taking damage, attack power is increased for 15 seconds.

name: Dragon Attack
description: Increases weapon's dragon-element value.

name: Attack Boost
description: Increases attack power.

name: Poison Attack
description: Increases weapon's poison buildup value.

name: Fire Attack
description: Increases weapon's fire-element value.

name: Water Attack
description: Increases weapon's water-element value.

name: Ice Attack
description: Increases weapon's ice-element value.

name: Thunder Attack
description: Increases weapon's thunder-element value.

name: Critical Eye
description: Increases affinity.

name: Fortify
description: Increases attack power by (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) for 40 seconds each time you revive after fainting during a hunt.

name: Weakness Exploit
description: Increases affinity when attacking a monster's weak spot.

name: Focus
description: Shortens charging time for weapons with charge attacks by certain %, and increases the fill rate of the Spirit Gauge by certain %.

name: Recoil Down
description: Reduces bowgun recoil.

name: Offensive Guard
description: Increases attack power by (10%, 15%, 20%, 30%, 40%) for 10 seconds after executing a well-timed guard.

name: Burst
description: Landing consecutive hits in a short span of time increases attack power for certain seconds.

name: Heroics
description: Increases attack power by (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) when your health drops to 29% or lower.

name: Reload Speed
description: Reduces reload time for bowguns.

name: Sneak Attack
description: Increases damage by (10%, 15%, 20%, 25%, 30%) when attacking a monster from behind.

name: Peak Performance
description: Increases attack power when your health is full.

name: Special Boost
description: Increases the damage of Special Skills by (10%, 20%, 30%, 45%, 60%).

name: Solidarity (Pumpkin Hunt)
description: Increases attack power the more of your fellow hunters have this skill activated.

name: Special Insurance
description: Special Gauge increases when fainting during a hunt.

name: Bleeding Resistance
description: Grants a chance to prevent bleeding status.

name: Tremor Resistance
description: Negates ground tremors.

name: Sleep Resistance
description: Grants a chance to prevent sleep status/prevents sleep.

name: Health Boost
description: Increases health by (10, 20, 30, 40, 50).

name: Defense Boost
description: Increases defense by (20, 40, 60, 80, 100).

name: Poison Resistance
description: Grants a chance to prevent poison status/prevents poisoning.

name: Paralysis Resistance
description: Grants a chance to prevent paralysis status/prevents paralysis.

name: Fire Resistance
description: Decreases damage from fire-element monsters.

name: Water Resistance
description: Decreases damage from water-element monsters.

name: Ice Resistance
description: Decreases damage from ice-element monsters.

name: Thunder Resistance
description: Decreases damage from thunder-element monsters.

name: Divine Blessing
description: (30%, 40%, 50%, 50%, 50%) chance of reducing damage from a monster's attack by (50%, 50%, 50%, 60%, 80%).

name: Guard
description: Reduces damage and knockback when guarding against monster attacks.

name: Last Stand
description: Increases defense when your health drops below a certain level.

name: Artful Dodger
description: Makes perfect evades (ever so slightly, slightly, moderately, much easier, significantly) easier to perform.

name: Guts
description: Survive lethal damage taken at certain health or above.

name: Kushala Frostwind
description: Reduces the effects of wind pressure/dragon wind pressure, and increases ice element attack power.

name: Quick Work
description: Increases the speed of sheathing or transforming your weapon.

name: Happy New Year (2024)
description: Wish other players a Happy New Year.

name: Evasive Concentration
description: Fills Special Gauge after performing a perfect evade.

name: Concentration
description: Increases Special Gauge fill rate by (5%, 10%, 15%, 20%, 30%).

name: Paralysis Attack
description: Increases weapon's paralysis buildup.

name: Evade Extender
description: (Very slightly, Slightly, Moderately, Greatly, Massively) extends evasion distance.

name: Partbreaker
description: Increases part damage accumulated on breakable parts by (5%, 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%).

name: Firm Foothold
description: Reduces knockback when taking damage.

name: Earplugs
description: Reduces/Nullifies the effects of weak monster roars.

name: Rising Tide
description: (Very slightly, Slightly, Moderately, Greatly, Massively) Increases attack power and defense as the hunt timer runs out.

name: Windproof
description: Reduces/Negates the effects of wind pressure.

name: Slugger
description: Increases stun power by (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%).

name: Lock On
description: If using close-range weapons, it displays a lock-on button while hunting, allowing a specific monster body part to be targeted.

name: Rude Awakener
description: Increases the damage of the first attack dealt to sleeping monsters.

name: Bubbly Dance
description: Reduces the effects of bubbleblight.

name: Resuscitate
description: Increases damage when you are suffering from a status ailment.

name: Teostra Blastpowder
description: Makes it easier to rid yourself of blastblight and easier to inflict blast buildup on monsters.

name: Defensive Loading
description: Reloads phial/ammo when blocking with charge blade/gunlance/heavy bowgun.

name: Hellfire Cloak
description: Inflict yourself with hellfireblight/gain decreased defense and increased attack.

name: Blast Resistance
description: Grants a chance to prevent blast status/prevents blastblight.

name: Fighting Spirit
description: Increases damage dealt when the Special Gauge becomes full.

name: Poison Exploit
description: Damage against monsters inflicted with poison increases by (30%, 45%, 60%, 80%, 100%)

name: Kirin Flashstorm
description: Makes it easier to get rid of paralysis and increases thunder element attack power by (10%, 15%, 25%).

name: Valor
description: Increases attack power as your health decreases.

name: Critical Ferocity
description: Increases the damage of critical hits and boosts affinity.

name: Blast Attack
description: Increases weapon's blast buildup value.

name: Litheness
description: Increases evasion and movement speed.

name: Critical Element
description: Weapon's elemental attack power inreased by (30%, 40%, 50%, 60%, 80%) when landing a critical hit.

name: Bleeding Edge
description: Increases damage dealt while suffering from bleeding.

name: Nergigante Avidity
description: Damage increased by (10%, 15%, 30%), but Special Gauge will no longer fill when attacking.

name: Evading Reload
description: Reloads your weapon after a successful evade.

name: Shared Sword
description: Increases attack power when multiple hunters have this skill equipped.

name: Shared Shield
description: Increases defense when multiple hunters have this skill equipped.

name: Morph Boost
description: Increases the speed and power of morph attacks.

name: Raw Power
description: Increases raw (non-elemental) attack power.

name: Chameleos Venomist
description: Increases poison buildup and resistance to poison.

name: Final Shot
description: Increases damage dealt by the last hit in a combo or the final shot of a ranged weapon.

name: Paralysis Exploit
description: Increases damage dealt to paralyzed monsters.

name: Blunt Force
description: Increases damage dealt with blunt weapons.

name: Buildup Boost
description: Increases status buildup when attacking monsters.

name: MrBeast Challenge!
description: Great things will happen after using certain atacks!

name: Balloon Charge
description: Whenever you charge up an attack/Special Skill to the max, your weapon will expand, increasing damage.

name: Eggsplosive
description: Whenever you activate Element Boost, your shield will begin to glow, powering up your phials' explosions.
